system.effect: Can push away slow moving objects that would otherwise collide with the ship. Whenever this ship would take damage from Asteroids, Space Debris, Torpedos, Bombers, or Ramming, reduce damage by 1 per point of power allocated (max 3). For torpedos it applies this per torpedo, for all other damage it is applied to combined damage.
